title: Viceroy Luxury Just Steps from Santa Monica’s Oceanfront and Iconic Pier
description: Swap California dreaming for California living, staying in Viceroy luxury mere steps from the beach at Viceroy Santa Monica - and less than 30 minutes from LAX. Immerse yourself in the lifestyle of this sun-kissed coastal city, where you can ride the longest oceanfront bike trail in the world, enjoy the attractions at the historic Santa Monica Pier, tap into foodie heaven and explore nearby Beverly Hills, Hollywood and beyond. Your exclusive three-night escape includes two a la carte breakfasts per person, one daily poolside cocktail each, a glass of sparkling wine each on arrival, a one-hour historic tour of Santa Monica Pier, hotel perks including unlimited Wi-Fi, morning coffee and 50% off nightly drinks and dining at VICE HOUR, a US$150 credit towards poolside cabana rental and more. Take advantage of this exclusive offer now and travel until March 2020.
offer_address: 1819 Ocean Ave, Santa Monica, CA 90401, USA

title: Beach Chic Just Steps from Santa Monica’s Oceanfront and Iconic Pier
description: Swap California dreaming for California living, staying in Viceroy luxury mere steps from the beach at Viceroy Santa Monica - and less than 30 minutes from LAX. Immerse yourself in the lifestyle of this sun-kissed coastal city, where you can ride the longest oceanfront bike trail in the world, enjoy the attractions at the historic Santa Monica Pier, tap into foodie heaven and explore nearby Beverly Hills, Hollywood and beyond. Your exclusive escape includes daily a la carte breakfast, hotel amenities including a sparkling beverage on arrival, complimentary bottled water, Wi-Fi, bicycle hire and more. Special offers include 50% off nightly drinks and dining at VICE HOUR and half-price boxing classes at BoxUnion. Take advantage of this exclusive offer now and travel until December 2019.
offer_address: 1819 Ocean Ave, Santa Monica, CA 90401, USA

title: Grand Opening: Santa Monica’s First and Only Luxury Lifestyle Hotel
description: As the Westside's first and only luxury lifestyle hotel, Santa Monica Proper introduces a looser kind of luxury to Santa Monica. Within walking distance to the beach, each of the 271 rooms, suites and spaces successfully optimise the city’s abundant ocean breezes and natural light, while the interior design finds inspiration in the organic tones and textures of the local coastline. Santa Monica Proper beckons guests with the only rooftop pool deck and the landmark restaurant, Onda (opening August), marking an iconic collaboration between James Beard award-winning chefs Jessica Koslow and Gabriela Camara. With an emphasis on Eastern inspired wellness, the hotel’s Surya Spa (opening November), offers custom-designed Ayurvedic programs supporting physical, mental and spiritual health. Your exclusive Luxury Escapes package includes daily breakfast for two, one rooftop cocktail each (once per stay) and a daily US$50 food and beverage credit to use at any of the on-site restaurants and bars.
offer_address: 700 Wilshire Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401, USA

title: Luxury Santa Monica Hotel Moments from the Ocean & Iconic Pier
description: Swap California dreaming for California living with a luxury stay at Viceroy Santa Monica - enviably located mere steps from the golden beachfront and close to the best attractions of bustling Los Angeles. Embraced by gently rustling palm trees, mountains and salty ocean breezes, this stylish property features two shimmering outdoor pools and the laidback Sugar Palm Ocean Avenue, offering an indoor-outdoor dining and nightlife experience with a wraparound bar and poolside cabanas.
offer_address: 1819 Ocean Avenue, Santa Monica, California 90401, United States

title: Coastal-Cool California Oceanfront Luxury near Santa Monica Pier with Outdoor Pool
description: Steeped in seaside glamour and kissed by California sunshine, Regent Santa Monica Hotel, an IHG Hotel offers timeless elegance in the heart of one of Los Angeles’ most coveted beach towns. Spend your days exploring the city’s iconic sights - walk along Santa Monica Pier (home to Pacific Park amusement park), shop and eat your way through Third Street Promenade and peruse the area's famed farmers markets and art galleries.
location_description: Regent Santa Monica Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1700 Ocean Avenue, Santa Monica, California, 90401, United States

title: Stylish Seaside Santa Monica Luxury with Five Eateries & Lagoon Pool
description:
Experience Santa Monica’s most storied coastal retreat, home to the region’s only private bungalows and a legacy of celebrity stays including Greta Garbo and Marilyn Monroe. Set atop the bluffs overlooking the golden beaches of Los Angeles, this 19th-century estate is a luxury hideaway placing you moments from the Santa Monica Pier and Third Street Promenade.

Unwind by the palm-fringed pool or savor ocean-to-table flavors at FIG Restaurant. Sip handcrafted cocktails with sunset views at The Bungalow, or enjoy an intimate eight-seat sushi experience at Soko Sushi, which also offers meals to go.

Stay refreshed with the onsite Em Styles Salon and Lloyd's Barbershop and a 24-hour fitness centre. Spanning five acres of lush gardens, embody laid-back luxury with effortless California cool.
offer_address: 101 Wilshire Boulevard, Santa Monica, California 90401, USA

title: Stylish Santa Monica Stay Steps from Beachfront with Saltwater Pool & Ocean View Restaurant
description: Make a splash with a sunsine-soaked stay at The Pierside Santa Monica, moments from the beach and overlooking the picturesque pier. Enjoy leisurely and laid-back days in stylish, ocean-inspired spaces, and ensure a refreshing dip in the outdoor saltwater pool. Or loan a surfboard or skateboard from the onsite shop and head out to explore the best of the area's beaches, trails and parks, before treating yourself to a deliciously flavourful SoCal meal at The Surfing Fox as you watch the tide come in.
offer_address: 120 Colorado Ave, Santa Monica, California 90401, USA
